DocAttribute.Name: ImpactType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Specification of the environmental impact type to be referenced.

DocAttribute.Name: Category
DocAttribute.Documentation: The category into which the environmental impact value falls.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedCategory
DocAttribute.Documentation: A user defined value category into which the environmental impact value falls.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedCategory must be asserted when the value of the IfcEnvironmentalImpactCategoryEnum is set to USERDEFINED.
